data.title: Who discovered the stopping voltage in the photoelectric effect
data.meta_description: It's widely considered that Lenard observed stopping voltage in his study of photoelectric effect: Lenard P., Annalen der Physik, 8, 149-198 (1902). In this work Lenard cites, among others, A.G.Sto...
data.text:
It's widely considered that Lenard observed stopping voltage in his study of photoelectric effect: Lenard P., Annalen der Physik, 8, 149-198 (1902). In this work Lenard cites, among others, A.G.Stoletow's papers: A. G. Stoletow, Journ. d. russ. phys. chem. Ges. 21. 1889; Uebersetzung mit Zuegtzen dee Verfassers in Phys. Revue 1. p. 721. 1892.

Does anyone have an English or Russian translation of these papers and and/or more information regarding the discovery of stopping potential in photoelectric effect?
